name: Aikagura
description:
*Story

When the long war was about to end and the world was heading toward a peaceful era, the country of Totsuka was suddenly devastated by a mass outbreak of demons.
Tenkami Mitsuki, a skilled demon exorcist belonging to the Onmyoryo-Chobukukata, a demon exorcism organization under the direct control of the Imperial Court, is ordered by the Imperial Court to go to the Land of Totsuka.


*Game Description

This is an authentic side-scrolling Japanese sword-fighting action game.
You control the main character, Mitsuki, as she fights off the attacking demons and investigates the cause of the calamity that has befallen the land of Totsuka.


*Two modes: human and fox

At any given moment, Mitsuki can change into a powerful "fox" state for a certain period of time.
While in the fox state, she has superior attack power, she is also vulnerable.
Change into the fox state at the critical moment to take advantage of the battle.


*Parry and defense value

With the exception of some attacks, enemy attacks can be defended against.
By defending at the right time, you can parry enemy attacks and reduce their defense value.
When the defensive value is reduced, the enemy becomes defenseless and (you) can inflict twice as much damage.


*Skill tree and skill acquisition

Skills are unlocked by picking up items along the way, and skills can be acquired and enhanced by paying skill points.
Strengthen the skills of your choice and advance the battle to your advantage.


*In case of defeat

If Mitsuki is captured by the enemy or defeated by the enemy. A terrible fate will befall her.
Restraint attacks and game over scenes are rendered with smooth animation.
